t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: So, is this where the incident all began? Right here?

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Empress Kaguya and her courtiers Reisen and Eirin aren't affected by this, so...
Yeah, and they didn't notice it with Tewi.

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I don't want to be stuck with this hair. I look stupid. Everyone in the Palace of Eternity doesn't.
I was unaffected, but do you think restoring your hair is important? Do you have faith in success?

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: That's something Sanae might have, but not me.

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: How come you're also not affected, unlike that one siren I fought earlier?

t_scene_info.speaker: Kiyomi:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Everyone in Gensokyo will not have any chance to be freed from this spell!

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: What do you know about this spell? This better be important! You can help me fix this problem.

t_scene_info.speaker: Kiyomi:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I've had no success in finding a possible solution.

t_scene_info.speaker: Kiyomi:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I don't know a word or two about the incident. I think you are stuck with this.

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I will not give up. I'm convinced there is a solution to this.

t_scene_info.speaker: Kiyomi:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Even if you want to fight me, you will still be unable to find a solution.

t_scene_info.speaker: Kiyomi:
t_scene_info.dialogue: You'll have to live with it.

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Failure won't be an option. Bring it on.
